Title: Flat UI for ASP controls Sharp Edges زوايا حاده
Description: This project is intended for developers who are looking a simple flat UI for ASP controls with right to left support "RTL"
HomeWiki:
Sharp Edges UI -  زوايا حاده


Flat UI "Sharp Edges" "زوايا حاده" for ASP controls. The project supports right to left "RTL" languages such as Arabic. Beta Version, works fine on chrome, firefox ...IE css needs some tuning.

The Demo for this project includes a set of ASP controls:

  • Navigation Menu control
  • Textbox control
  • Button control
  • Search textbox control
  • Data Grid control
  • Dropdown list control
  • Check box control
  • Radio Button control
  • Tabs control
  • Log in control
  • Accordion control
